item.title: zer0pts CTF 2022
item.description: GitFile Explorer Type: LFI // index.php function h($s) { return htmlspecialchars($s); } function craft_url($service, $owner, $repo, $branch, $file) { if (strpos($service, "github") !== false) { /* GitHub URL */ return $service."/".$owner."/".$repo."/".$branch."/".$file; } else if (strpos($service, "gitlab") !== false) { /* GitLab URL */ return $service."/".$owner."/".$repo."/-/raw/".$branch."/".$file; } else if (strpos($service, "bitbucket") !== false) { /* BitBucket URL */ return $service."/".$owner."/".$repo."/raw/".$branch."/".$file; } return null; } $service = empty($_GET['service']) ?
